banner.secondTitle: Discover Senegal on an electric bike

first.title: First Advantage
first.description: By bike, discovering a country becomes an immersive experience where every pedal stroke reveals hidden treasures and authentic encounters, transforming the journey into an unforgettable human adventure.

second.title: Discover
second.description: During your cycling tour, you'll discover magnificent landscapes your senses at every turn. From majestic mountains to lush valleys, every pedal stroke will take you through spectacular panoramas, offering an unforgettable experience in the heart of nature.

third.title: Taste the dishes
third.description: During your cycling expedition, you'll discover delicious African dishes, authentic flavors and traditional recipes rich in history, offering a unique culinary experience by our chef!

excursions.title: Our excursions
excursions.description: For a few hours, half a day or a full day, we offer a range of private tours. For more information, don't hesitate to contact us by e-mail or book directly.

second.title: On the road of Joal Fadiouth

third.title: In the heart of the villages

prices.title: Take advantage of our offers
prices.reservationProcessing: Reservation requests processed within a maximum of 48 hours
prices.description: Three exciting experiences await you during your visit. We're here to meet your every need. Don't hesitate to contact us by e-mail for any specific request or to book your experience now.

teams.title: The team behind Thiop Thiop Bike
teams.description: This is the team behind the Thiop Thiop Bike project. Specially composed of Senegalese culture enthusiasts, chefs and guides.
